content.en: AI-Enhanced IVF: Scientists are exploring the use of artificial intelligence algorithms to improve the success rates of in vitro fertilization (IVF) procedures. These algorithms can predict the implantation potential of embryos, select the best embryos for transfer, and even predict the risk of miscarriage. By analyzing various features of embryos, such as morphology and genetic information, these algorithms aim to increase the chances of a successful pregnancy for couples undergoing IVF.
content.da: AI-forbedret IVF: Forskere undersøger brugen af kunstige intelligensalgoritmer for at forbedre succesraterne ved in vitro-fertilisering (IVF) procedurer. Disse algoritmer kan forudsige implantationsevnen af embryoner, vælge de bedste embryoner til overførsel og endda forudsige risikoen for spontan abort. Ved at analysere forskellige egenskaber ved embryoner, såsom morfologi og genetisk information, sigter disse algoritmer mod at øge chancerne for en vellykket graviditet for par, der gennemgår IVF.
